description:
It's time to say goodbye to DaVinci's Demons. The show's previously announced third season will be the Starz drama's last, according to the Hollywood Reporter. Scheduled to debut October 24, Season 3 is the first under new showrunner John Shiban, who took over for creator David Goyer.是时候与《达芬奇的恶魔》说再见了，该剧在之前宣布第三季将会是最终季。将于10月24日开播的第三季由约翰·史班John Shiban代替David Goyer接任制作人。

"While ending Leonardo's journey is bittersweet for me, I'm happy we're ending the story on a high note," Goyer said. "Leonardo was famous for his mirror-writing, and there's a symmetry to the entire series—between the first episode and the final one—that I think the maestro would have appreciated. I want to thank our dedicated fans around the world for viewing and engaging with such passion. I want to thank Starz for joining me on this crazy romp. And I want to thank Tom Riley for turning in a consistently brilliant performance. It's no small feat to portray a genius, but Tom did it with grace and humor. I hope everyone enjoys these final episodes as much as we enjoyed making them."高耶说道：“结束达芬奇的这段旅程对我而言是苦乐参半的，我很高兴剧集不会烂尾。达芬奇的“镜书”十分有名，而该剧的第一集和最后一集也是对称的。我想要感谢对这部剧不离不弃的观众们，感想Starz对剧组的支持以及Tom Riley的精彩表演。要刻画一位天才是不容易的，但汤姆在这方面做得很好。我希望大家都能像我们一样欣赏最后的这一季。”
